https://info.maybank2u.com.sg/personal/cards/credit/credit-card-for-student-evibes.aspx
There is also DBS Live Fresh Student Card. Gives you 0.3% cashback.
https://www.dbs.com.sg/personal/cards/credit-cards/live-fresh-dbs-visa-paywave-500-card
I would go for DBS Visa Debit Card if you are going to spend more than $400 a month. Gives you 3% Cashback.
